data.title: Great locally owned alternative to Starbucks
data.text: Prefer to go to Jitterz because the service is excellent and its supporting a local business (instead of a megacorp ie Starbucks). Drinks and sweets are better and the atmosphere is nicer, friendlier and makes you feel good supporting someone from your own community.

data.title: Lovely, but watch out for the Saturday night
data.text: This is a nice place, decent coffee and tea worth the purchase if your into the "shop local" philosophy. I visited once on a coffee date which was lovely and a second time when I wanted to drink some coffee while I knitted a hat for a friend. If you're a little crowd weary beware that Saturday nights you will be surrounded by a plethora of hipster youngsters.

data.title: Best Coffee Ever
data.text: Jitterz has the best coffee and pastries ever. My husband and I really enjoy the atmosphere. I always order the frozen mocha with caramel and my husband orders the same , but with chocolate.  Delicious......

data.title: Good Coffe and Great atmosphere
data.text: Really good coffee and very friendly staff.  This place is really quaint with several seating areas.  It is a great place to meet with friends or co-workers and also a good place to study or read.
